headline: How the 14% Share Price Jump Changes the Picture for NextEra Energy in 2025
summary: Ever wondered if NextEra Energy stock is actually a smart buy at today's prices? Let's break past the headlines and look under the hood at what really drives value. Recently, NextEra Energy shares have climbed 2.6% in the last week and are up 14.0% over the past year, giving investors reasons to keep a close eye on shifting growth and risk dynamics. Much of the recent momentum has come amid a growing focus on renewables and major utility infrastructure investments. Both of these factors have...
